result.description:
Maps the data items retrieved from related records filter to data set component values. View Template resolver block of Related Records now-data-set EVAM component. Performs following key activities -
a) Retreives the list of records corresponding to the filter
b) Gets the valid templates based on the selected Table
c) retrieves the actual view component prop-field map, prop-action map corresponding to each data-item that it gets as input from EVAM Data Fetcher
d) runs over each data-item to
 - resolve values for view component props using prop-field lookup
 - translate or sanitize static values for view component prop
 - resolve view component action from prop-action lookup
e) returns list of component with resolved propValues to render each data-item

result.description:
To check for if there are any best practices which were changed for a given release. The best practices are changed based on the following condition :

Say we have a relesase as "Release SomeVersion", then for this ( current ) release version , the condition to check for updated / changed / removed best practices will be :
<  "first_introduced"== "Release SomeVersion" OR changed == "Release SomeVersion" OR "removed" == "Release SomeVersion" >

This should give us total count of all BPs changed for the current release that is - "ReleaseNow"

result.description:
View Template resolver block of EVAM. Performs following key activities -
a) retrieves the actual view component prop-field map, prop-action map corresponding to each data-item that it gets as input from EVAM Data Fetcher
b) runs over each data-item to
 - resolve values for view component props using prop-field lookup
 - translate or sanitize static values for view component prop
 - resolve view component action from prop-action lookup
c) returns list of component with resolved propValues to render each data-item

function transform(input) {
    return {
        "on": gs.getMessage("on"),
        "off": gs.getMessage("off").toLowerCase(),
        "activate": gs.getMessage("Activate"),
        "deflection_settings_activate": gs.getMessage("Tracking of deflection metrics in Virtual Agent is enabled"),
        "deflection_settings_deactivate": gs.getMessage("Tracking of deflection metrics in Virtual Agent is disabled"),
        "deflection_pattern_success": gs.getMessage("Deflection Pattern changes saved successfully"),
        "deflection_config_success": gs.getMessage("Deflection Configuration changes saved successfully"),
        "deflection_alert": gs.getMessage("The following mandatory fields are not filled in:\nName"),
        "chat_settings_success": gs.getMessage("Agent Chat settings saved successfully"),
        "chat_notification_success": gs.getMessage("Chat client notification settings saved successfully"),
        "update_failed": gs.getMessage("Something went wrong while updating the settings, please refresh the page"),
        "virtual_agent": gs.getMessage("Virtual Agent"),
        "nlu": gs.getMessage("Natural Language Understanding (NLU)"),
        "nlu_settings_success": gs.getMessage("NLU settings saved successfully"),
        "upgrade_alert": gs.getMessage("Please upgrade to access all features. Contact your account executive for more information"),
        "mandatory_alert": gs.getMessage("Please fill all the mandatory fields"),
        "icon": gs.getMessage("Icon"),
        "label": gs.getMessage("Label"),
        "type": gs.getMessage("Type"),
        "value": gs.getMessage("Value"),
        "conversation_history_settings": gs.getMessage("Conversation History Settings"),
        "conversation_history_settings_success": gs.getMessage("Conversation history settings saved successfully")
    };
}
